title: Contemporary 2BR plus Flex Space in Historic North Loop Rehab!
posting_body: ['We’re excited to announce 724 Lofts, a gorgeous historic rehab!', '724 Lofts is a historic building with brand new interiors, exposed brick, functional floor plans, and superior customer service located in the idyllic walkable, bike-able North Loop neighborhood.', 'Your backyard is the Mississippi River National Recreation Area, with miles of trails winding through parkland.', 'Your front yard is the North Loop playground with bars, restaurants, and boutique retail; all just a short walk to world class sports and entertainment venues like the Guthrie Theatre, Twins Stadium, Fillmore, and First Ave!', '#502 -- Plan B', 'Unit 502 is a two bedroom, one bath unit with an additional multipurpose den space on the fifth floor.', 'This unit is finished with sleek polished concrete flooring, Carrera Cloud quartz countertops, and LED lighting throughout.', 'It features an in-unit washer and dryer, kitchen island, spacious closets, and beautiful large historic windows for ample sunlight.', 'Be among the first to call 724 Lofts home!', 'For info on amenities and to apply: <URL>', 'Prices & Specials subject to change.', '724 Lofts is managed by Solhem Companies: <URL>', 'Minneapolis -- Mpls -- North Loop -- Warehouse District -- NE -- Northeast -- U of M -- Boutique -- Luxury -- Scandinavian -- Mid-Century Modern -- Bike Friendly -- Pet, Dog, Cat Friendly -- Green Living -- Sustainable -- Electric Car Charging -- Historic Rehab']
